<onlyinclude>
==bAllowMultipleMasterLoads==
* '''Default:''' <Code>0</Code>
Allows multiple master [[Data File]]s to be loaded within the [[Creation Kit]] at once.
A [[Data File]] may be loaded through the [[Data Window]].

'''Examples'''
<source lang="ini">
[General]
; Enables multiple master loading.
bAllowMultipleMasterLoads=1
</Source>
<BR>
<source lang="ini">
[General]
; Enables multiple master loading.
bAllowMultipleMasterLoads=0
</Source>
</onlyinclude>
